prompt:
Translate the following subtitles into Korean. 

Please PRESERVE ALL the original timestamps for EACH ENTRY.

Subtitles to process:
[
  {
    "start": "00:00:03,479",
    "end": "00:00:08,860",
    "lang": "zh",
    "text": "老板家的这个肥肠好做又好吃"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:12,639",
    "end": "00:00:14,380",
    "lang": "zh",
    "text": "会回购哦"
  }
]

ONLY and ALWAYS return a valid JSON back:
```json
[
  {
    "start": "timestamp",
    "end": "timestamp",
    "ko": "Korean text"
  }
]
```

response.ko: 사장님 집의 이 대창은 만들기도 쉽고 맛있어요
